SQL.LOAD: SELECT dealer_id, sku_number, sku_description, manufacturer_id, manufacturer_name, warranty_type, warranty_description, model_number, warranty_duration_parts, warranty_duration_labor, created_date, modified_date, created_by, modified_by, is_deleted, risk_type_id, warranty_master_id FROM elp_warranty_master WHERE warranty_master_id = :warranty_master_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: select WARRANTY_MASTER_ID, dealer dealer_code, C.CODE || ' - ' || dealer_name DEALER_NAME, SKU_NUMBER, SKU_DESCRIPTION, MANUFACTURER_ID, MANUFACTURER_NAME, case WARRANTY_TYPE when '0' then 'PRP'when '1' then 'PSP' when '2' then 'MFG' end WARRANTY_TYPE, WARRANTY_DESCRIPTION, MODEL_NUMBER, WARRANTY_DURATION_PARTS, WARRANTY_DURATION_LABOR, wm.CREATED_DATE, wm.MODIFIED_DATE, wm.CREATED_BY,wm.MODIFIED_BY, IS_DELETED, r.description risk_type from elita.elp_warranty_master wm left outer join elp_dealer edealer on wm.DEALER_ID = edealer.DEALER_ID left outer join elp_company c on c.company_id = edealer.company_id left outer join elp_risk_type r on r.RISK_TYPE_ID = wm.RISK_TYPE_ID where 1=1 and wm.sku_number like :sku_number and upper(nvl(wm.manufacturer_name,'%')) like upper(:manufacturer_name) and upper(nvl(wm.model_number,'%')) like upper(:model_number) --dynamic_in_clause --dynamic_where_clause order by UPPER(DEALER_NAME), UPPER(dealer)
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_warranty_master SET dealer_id = :dealer_id, sku_number = :sku_number, sku_description = :sku_description, manufacturer_id = :manufacturer_id, manufacturer_name = :manufacturer_name, warranty_type = :warranty_type, warranty_description = :warranty_description, model_number = :model_number, warranty_duration_parts = :warranty_duration_parts, warranty_duration_labor = :warranty_duration_labor, is_deleted = :is_deleted, risk_type_id = :risk_type_id, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE warranty_master_id = :warranty_master_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_warranty_master ( dealer_id, sku_number, sku_description, manufacturer_id, manufacturer_name, warranty_type, warranty_description, model_number, warranty_duration_parts, warranty_duration_labor, is_deleted, risk_type_id, created_by, warranty_master_id ) VALUES ( :dealer_id, :sku_number, :sku_description, :manufacturer_id, :manufacturer_name, :warranty_type, :warranty_description, :model_number, :warranty_duration_parts, :warranty_duration_labor, :is_deleted, :risk_type_id, :created_by, :warranty_master_id )
SQL.WS_GET_MAKE_MODEL_FROM_WARRANTY_MASTER_F: select Manufacturer_Name, Model_Number, Internal_manufacturer_id from elp_warranty_master where sku_number= :sku_number and dealer_id = :dealer_id
